# obc-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute       | Description             | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | --------------- | ----------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `iconId`      | `icon-id`       | The icon name           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `sizePx`      | `size-px`       | The icon size in pixels | `number`  | `24`        |
| `useCssColor` | `use-css-color` |                         | `boolean` | `false`     |
